   364â†’```python
   365â†’class DayMasterStrength(Enum):
   366â†’    """æ—¥ä¸»å¼ºå¼±ç­‰çº§"""
   367â†’    EXTREMELY_STRONG = "ææ—º"  # å¾—ä»¤å¾—åœ°å¾—åŠ¿ï¼Œéœ€è¦æ³„è€—
   368â†’    STRONG = "åæ—º"            # æœ‰æ ¹æœ‰æ°”ï¼Œå–œæ³„è€—
   369â†’    BALANCED = "ä¸­å’Œ"          # èº«æ—ºå¼±å¹³è¡¡ï¼Œå–œé¡ºåŠ¿
   370â†’    WEAK = "åå¼±"              # æ— æ ¹å°‘æ°”ï¼Œå–œç”Ÿæ‰¶

   373â†’def calculate_day_master_strength(bazi: BaziChart) -> tuple[DayMasterStrength, float]:
   374â†’    """
   375â†’    è®¡ç®—æ—¥ä¸»å¼ºå¼±
   376â†’
   377â†’    Returns:
   378â†’        (å¼ºå¼±ç­‰çº§, å¼ºåº¦åˆ†æ•° -1.0 åˆ° 1.0)
   379â†’    """
   380â†’    score = 0.0
   381â†’
   382â†’    # 1. å¾—ä»¤åˆ¤æ–­ (æœˆæ”¯å¯¹æ—¥ä¸»çš„å½±å“) - æƒé‡40%
   383â†’    seasonal_factor = get_seasonal_strength(bazi.day_master, bazi.month_branch)
   384â†’    score += seasonal_factor * 0.4
   385â†’
   386â†’    # 2. å¾—åœ°åˆ¤æ–­ (å››æ”¯å¯¹æ—¥ä¸»çš„æ ¹æ°”) - æƒé‡30%
   387â†’    root_factor = calculate_root_strength(bazi.day_master, bazi.branches)
   388â†’    score += root_factor * 0.3
   389â†’
   390â†’    # 3. å¾—åŠ¿åˆ¤æ–­ (å¤©å¹²é€å‡ºçš„å¸®æ‰¶) - æƒé‡20%
   391â†’    support_factor = calculate_stem_support(bazi.day_master, bazi.stems)
   392â†’    score += support_factor * 0.2
   393â†’
   394â†’    # 4. åˆå†²ä¿®æ­£ (å¹²æ”¯åˆåŒ–ã€åœ°æ”¯å†²åˆ) - æƒé‡10%
   395â†’    combination_factor = calculate_combination_effect(bazi)
   396â†’    score += combination_factor * 0.1
   397â†’
   398â†’    # è½¬æ¢ä¸ºç­‰çº§
   399â†’    if score >= 0.6:
   400â†’        return (DayMasterStrength.EXTREMELY_STRONG, score)
   401â†’    elif score >= 0.2:
   402â†’        return (DayMasterStrength.STRONG, score)
   403â†’    elif score >= -0.2:
   404â†’        return (DayMasterStrength.BALANCED, score)
   405â†’    elif score >= -0.6:
   406â†’        return (DayMasterStrength.WEAK, score)
   407â†’    else:
   408â†’        return (DayMasterStrength.EXTREMELY_WEAK, score)
   409â†’```

   842â†’### 3.5 å…«å­—ä¸»å¯¼èåˆç®—æ³•ï¼ˆv5.0 æ ¸å¿ƒå‡çº§ï¼‰
   843â†’
   844â†’```python
   845â†’class FusionStrategy:
   846â†’    """å…«å­—ä¸»å¯¼çš„ä¸œè¥¿æ–¹èåˆç­–ç•¥"""
   847â†’
   848â†’    # åŸºç¡€æƒé‡ï¼šå…«å­—70%ï¼Œæ˜Ÿåº§30%
   849â†’    BASE_BAZI_WEIGHT = 0.70
   850â†’    BASE_ZODIAC_WEIGHT = 0.30
   851â†’
   852â†’    # ä¸€è‡´æ€§å¥–åŠ±ï¼šå½“ä¸¤å¥—ç³»ç»ŸæŒ‡å‘åŒä¸€åŸå‹æ—¶
   853â†’    CONSISTENCY_BONUS = 0.15
   854â†’
   855â†’    # å†²çªå¤„ç†ï¼šå½“ä¸¤å¥—ç³»ç»ŸæŒ‡å‘å¯¹ç«‹åŸå‹æ—¶
   856â†’    CONFLICT_PENALTY = 0.10
   857â†’
   858â†’def calculate_fused_archetype(bazi_result, zodiac_result):
   859â†’    """
   860â†’    èåˆè®¡ç®—æœ€ç»ˆåŸå‹
   861â†’
   862â†’    ç­–ç•¥ï¼š
   863â†’    1. å…«å­—å†³å®šCoreåŸå‹ï¼ˆä¸»åŸå‹ï¼‰
   864â†’    2. æ˜Ÿåº§è°ƒæ•´è¡¨è¾¾å±‚æ¬¡ï¼ˆInner/Outerï¼‰
   865â†’    3. ä¸€è‡´æ€§å¢å¼ºç½®ä¿¡åº¦
   866â†’    4. å†²çªæ—¶å…«å­—ä¼˜å…ˆ
   867â†’    """
   868â†’
   869â†’    # Step 1: è·å–å…«å­—ä¸»åŸå‹
   870â†’    bazi_primary = bazi_result["primary"]
   871â†’
   872â†’    # Step 2: è·å–æ˜Ÿåº§ä¸»åŸå‹
   873â†’    zodiac_primary = zodiac_result["primary"]
   874â†’
   875â†’    # Step 3: ä¸€è‡´æ€§æ£€æŸ¥
   876â†’    consistency_type = check_consistency(bazi_primary, zodiac_primary)
   877â†’
   878â†’    # Step 4: èåˆè®¡ç®—
   879â†’    fused_scores = {}
   880â†’    for archetype in ALL_ARCHETYPES:
   881â†’        base_score = (
   882â†’            bazi_result["scores"].get(archetype, 0) * FusionStrategy.BASE_BAZI_WEIGHT +
   883â†’            zodiac_result["scores"].get(archetype, 0) * FusionStrategy.BASE_ZODIAC_WEIGHT
   884â†’        )
   885â†’
   886â†’        # ä¸€è‡´æ€§å¥–åŠ±
   887â†’        if archetype == bazi_primary and archetype == zodiac_primary:
   888â†’            base_score += FusionStrategy.CONSISTENCY_BONUS
   889â†’
   890â†’        fused_scores[archetype] = base_score
   891â†’
   892â†’    # Step 5: ç¡®å®šæœ€ç»ˆåŸå‹
   893â†’    primary_archetype = max(fused_scores, key=fused_scores.get)
   894â†’
   895â†’    # Step 6: ç¡®å®šå‰¯åŸå‹ï¼ˆæ’é™¤ä¸»åŸå‹åçš„æœ€é«˜åˆ†ï¼‰
   896â†’    secondary_scores = {k: v for k, v in fused_scores.items() if k != primary_archetype}
   897â†’    secondary_archetype = max(secondary_scores, key=secondary_scores.get)
   898â†’
   899â†’    # Step 7: è®¡ç®—ç½®ä¿¡åº¦
   900â†’    confidence = calculate_confidence(
   901â†’        fused_scores[primary_archetype],
   902â†’        fused_scores[secondary_archetype],
   903â†’        consistency_type
   904â†’    )
   905â†’
   906â†’    # Step 8: ç”Ÿæˆè§£é‡Š
   907â†’    explanation = generate_explanation(
   908â†’        primary_archetype, secondary_archetype,
   909â†’        bazi_primary, zodiac_primary,
   910â†’        consistency_type,
   911â†’        bazi_result["explanation"],
   912â†’        zodiac_result["explanations"]
   913â†’    )
   914â†’
   915â†’    return {
   916â†’        "primary_archetype": primary_archetype,
   917â†’        "secondary_archetype": secondary_archetype,
   918â†’        "all_scores": fused_scores,
   919â†’        "confidence": confidence,
   920â†’        "consistency_type": consistency_type,
   921â†’        "explanation": explanation,
   922â†’        "bazi_contribution": bazi_result,
   923â†’        "zodiac_contribution": zodiac_result
   924â†’    }
   925â†’
   926â†’def check_consistency(bazi_archetype, zodiac_archetype):
   927â†’    """æ£€æŸ¥å…«å­—å’Œæ˜Ÿåº§åŸå‹çš„ä¸€è‡´æ€§"""
   928â†’
   929â†’    if bazi_archetype == zodiac_archetype:
   930â†’        return "perfect_match"  # å®Œç¾ä¸€è‡´
   931â†’
   932â†’    # å®šä¹‰åŸå‹å¯¹ç«‹å…³ç³»
   933â†’    OPPOSING_PAIRS = [
   934â†’        ("Ruler", "Outlaw"),
   935â†’        ("Hero", "Innocent"),
   936â†’        ("Sage", "Jester"),
   937â†’        ("Caregiver", "Explorer"),
   938â†’    ]
   939â†’
   940â†’    for pair in OPPOSING_PAIRS:
   941â†’        if {bazi_archetype, zodiac_archetype} == set(pair):
   942â†’            return "conflict"  # å¯¹ç«‹å†²çª
   943â†’
   944â†’    # å®šä¹‰åŸå‹ç›¸è¿‘å…³ç³»
   945â†’    SIMILAR_GROUPS = [
   946â†’        {"Ruler", "Hero", "Magician"},
   947â†’        {"Sage", "Caregiver", "Regular"},
   948â†’        {"Creator", "Explorer", "Outlaw"},
   949â†’        {"Lover", "Innocent", "Jester"},
   950â†’    ]
   951â†’
   952â†’    for group in SIMILAR_GROUPS:
   953â†’        if bazi_archetype in group and zodiac_archetype in group:
   954â†’            return "similar"  # ç›¸è¿‘
   955â†’
   956â†’    return "neutral"  # ä¸­æ€§
   957â†’```

**è®¡ç®—æ¥æºï¼ˆv5.0 å‡çº§ï¼‰**ï¼š

- **ä¸€è‡´æ€§å¥–åŠ±**ï¼šå½“ä¸¤è€…æŒ‡å‘åŒä¸€åŸå‹æ—¶ï¼Œç½®ä¿¡åº¦+15%
- **å†²çªå¤„ç†**ï¼šå½“ä¸¤è€…æŒ‡å‘ä¸åŒåŸå‹æ—¶ï¼Œä»¥å…«å­—ä¸ºå‡†ï¼Œæ˜Ÿåº§ä½œä¸º"æ¬¡è¦èƒ½é‡"

#### æ—¥ä¸»å¼ºå¼±åˆ¤æ–­ï¼ˆv5.0 æ–°å¢ï¼‰

æ—¥ä¸»å¼ºå¼±æ˜¯åŸå‹è®¡ç®—çš„åŸºç¡€å‚æ•°ï¼Œå½±å“åŸå‹çš„è¡¨è¾¾æ–¹å¼ã€‚

```python
class DayMasterStrength(Enum):
    """æ—¥ä¸»å¼ºå¼±ç­‰çº§"""
    EXTREMELY_STRONG = "ææ—º"  # å¾—ä»¤å¾—åœ°å¾—åŠ¿ï¼Œéœ€è¦æ³„è€—
    STRONG = "åæ—º"            # æœ‰æ ¹æœ‰æ°”ï¼Œå–œæ³„è€—
    BALANCED = "ä¸­å’Œ"          # èº«æ—ºå¼±å¹³è¡¡ï¼Œå–œé¡ºåŠ¿
    WEAK = "åå¼±"              # æ— æ ¹å°‘æ°”ï¼Œå–œç”Ÿæ‰¶
    EXTREMELY_WEAK = "æå¼±"    # ä»æ ¼æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œéœ€ç‰¹æ®Šå¤„ç†

def calculate_day_master_strength(bazi: BaziChart) -> tuple[DayMasterStrength, float]:
    """
    è®¡ç®—æ—¥ä¸»å¼ºå¼±

    Returns:
        (å¼ºå¼±ç­‰çº§, å¼ºåº¦åˆ†æ•° -1.0 åˆ° 1.0)
    """
    score = 0.0

    # 1. å¾—ä»¤åˆ¤æ–­ (æœˆæ”¯å¯¹æ—¥ä¸»çš„å½±å“) - æƒé‡40%
    seasonal_factor = get_seasonal_strength(bazi.day_master, bazi.month_branch)
    score += seasonal_factor * 0.4

    # 2. å¾—åœ°åˆ¤æ–­ (å››æ”¯å¯¹æ—¥ä¸»çš„æ ¹æ°”) - æƒé‡30%
    root_factor = calculate_root_strength(bazi.day_master, bazi.branches)
    score += root_factor * 0.3

    # 3. å¾—åŠ¿åˆ¤æ–­ (å¤©å¹²é€å‡ºçš„å¸®æ‰¶) - æƒé‡20%
    support_factor = calculate_stem_support(bazi.day_master, bazi.stems)
    score += support_factor * 0.2

    # 4. åˆå†²ä¿®æ­£ (å¹²æ”¯åˆåŒ–ã€åœ°æ”¯å†²åˆ) - æƒé‡10%
    combination_factor = calculate_combination_effect(bazi)
    score += combination_factor * 0.1

    # è½¬æ¢ä¸ºç­‰çº§
    if score >= 0.6:
        return (DayMasterStrength.EXTREMELY_STRONG, score)
    elif score >= 0.2:
        return (DayMasterStrength.STRONG, score)
    elif score >= -0.2:
        return (DayMasterStrength.BALANCED, score)
    elif score >= -0.6:
        return (DayMasterStrength.WEAK, score)
    else:
        return (DayMasterStrength.EXTREMELY_WEAK, score)
```

```python
class UsefulGod(Enum):

    OUTPUT = "é£Ÿä¼¤"      # è¿½æ±‚è¡¨è¾¾ã€åˆ›é€ 
    PEER = "æ¯”åŠ«"        # è¿½æ±‚åˆä½œã€ç«äº‰

def determine_useful_god(bazi: BaziChart, strength: DayMasterStrength) -> UsefulGod:
    """
    æ ¹æ®æ—¥ä¸»å¼ºå¼±ç¡®å®šç”¨ç¥

    åŸºæœ¬åŸåˆ™ï¼š
    - èº«æ—ºï¼šå–œè´¢å®˜é£Ÿä¼¤ï¼ˆæ³„è€—ä¹‹ç¥ï¼‰
    - èº«å¼±ï¼šå–œå°æ¯”ï¼ˆç”Ÿæ‰¶ä¹‹ç¥ï¼‰

    """
    if strength in [DayMasterStrength.STRONG, DayMasterStrength.EXTREMELY_STRONG]:

    elif strength in [DayMasterStrength.WEAK, DayMasterStrength.EXTREMELY_WEAK]:

        else:

    else:
```

```python
def apply_strength_modifier(archetype_scores, strength_score):
    """
    æ—¥ä¸»å¼ºå¼±ä¿®æ­£åŸå‹è¡¨è¾¾

    èº«æ—ºï¼šå¢å¼ºå¤–å‘å‹åŸå‹ï¼ˆHero, Ruler, Outlaw, Explorer, Creator, Jesterï¼‰
    èº«å¼±ï¼šå¢å¼ºå†…å‘å‹åŸå‹ï¼ˆSage, Caregiver, Innocent, Lover, Regular, Magicianï¼‰
    """
    EXTROVERT_ARCHETYPES = {
        "Hero", "Ruler", "Outlaw", "Explorer", "Creator", "Jester"
    }
    INTROVERT_ARCHETYPES = {
        "Sage", "Caregiver", "Innocent", "Lover", "Regular", "Magician"
    }

    if strength_score > 0:  # èº«æ—º
        modifier = 1 + strength_score * 0.2  # æœ€å¤š+20%
        for archetype in EXTROVERT_ARCHETYPES:
            archetype_scores[archetype] *= modifier
    else:  # èº«å¼±
        modifier = 1 + abs(strength_score) * 0.2
        for archetype in INTROVERT_ARCHETYPES:
            archetype_scores[archetype] *= modifier

    return archetype_scores
```

```python
    # Step 4: æ ¼å±€+ç”¨ç¥ç»„åˆæ˜ å°„
    archetype_mapping = BAZI_ARCHETYPE_MAPPING[pattern][useful_god]

    bazi_scores = apply_strength_modifier(bazi_scores, strength_score)
```

```python
def calculate_zodiac_archetype(natal_chart):
```

### 3.5 å…«å­—ä¸»å¯¼èåˆç®—æ³•ï¼ˆv5.0 æ ¸å¿ƒå‡çº§ï¼‰

```python
class FusionStrategy:
    """å…«å­—ä¸»å¯¼çš„ä¸œè¥¿æ–¹èåˆç­–ç•¥"""

    # åŸºç¡€æƒé‡ï¼šå…«å­—70%ï¼Œæ˜Ÿåº§30%
    BASE_BAZI_WEIGHT = 0.70
    BASE_ZODIAC_WEIGHT = 0.30

    # ä¸€è‡´æ€§å¥–åŠ±ï¼šå½“ä¸¤å¥—ç³»ç»ŸæŒ‡å‘åŒä¸€åŸå‹æ—¶
    CONSISTENCY_BONUS = 0.15

    # å†²çªå¤„ç†ï¼šå½“ä¸¤å¥—ç³»ç»ŸæŒ‡å‘å¯¹ç«‹åŸå‹æ—¶
    CONFLICT_PENALTY = 0.10

def calculate_fused_archetype(bazi_result, zodiac_result):
    """
    èåˆè®¡ç®—æœ€ç»ˆåŸå‹

    ç­–ç•¥ï¼š
    1. å…«å­—å†³å®šCoreåŸå‹ï¼ˆä¸»åŸå‹ï¼‰
    2. æ˜Ÿåº§è°ƒæ•´è¡¨è¾¾å±‚æ¬¡ï¼ˆInner/Outerï¼‰
    3. ä¸€è‡´æ€§å¢å¼ºç½®ä¿¡åº¦
    4. å†²çªæ—¶å…«å­—ä¼˜å…ˆ
    """

    # Step 1: è·å–å…«å­—ä¸»åŸå‹
    bazi_primary = bazi_result["primary"]

    # Step 2: è·å–æ˜Ÿåº§ä¸»åŸå‹
    zodiac_primary = zodiac_result["primary"]

    # Step 3: ä¸€è‡´æ€§æ£€æŸ¥
    consistency_type = check_consistency(bazi_primary, zodiac_primary)

    # Step 4: èåˆè®¡ç®—
    fused_scores = {}
    for archetype in ALL_ARCHETYPES:
        base_score = (
            bazi_result["scores"].get(archetype, 0) * FusionStrategy.BASE_BAZI_WEIGHT +
            zodiac_result["scores"].get(archetype, 0) * FusionStrategy.BASE_ZODIAC_WEIGHT
        )

        # ä¸€è‡´æ€§å¥–åŠ±
        if archetype == bazi_primary and archetype == zodiac_primary:
            base_score += FusionStrategy.CONSISTENCY_BONUS

        fused_scores[archetype] = base_score

    # Step 5: ç¡®å®šæœ€ç»ˆåŸå‹
    primary_archetype = max(fused_scores, key=fused_scores.get)

    # Step 6: ç¡®å®šå‰¯åŸå‹ï¼ˆæ’é™¤ä¸»åŸå‹åçš„æœ€é«˜åˆ†ï¼‰
    secondary_scores = {k: v for k, v in fused_scores.items() if k != primary_archetype}
    secondary_archetype = max(secondary_scores, key=secondary_scores.get)

    # Step 7: è®¡ç®—ç½®ä¿¡åº¦
    confidence = calculate_confidence(
        fused_scores[primary_archetype],
        fused_scores[secondary_archetype],
        consistency_type
    )

    # Step 8: ç”Ÿæˆè§£é‡Š
    explanation = generate_explanation(
        primary_archetype, secondary_archetype,
        bazi_primary, zodiac_primary,
        consistency_type,
        bazi_result["explanation"],
        zodiac_result["explanations"]
    )

    return {
        "primary_archetype": primary_archetype,
        "secondary_archetype": secondary_archetype,
        "all_scores": fused_scores,
        "confidence": confidence,
        "consistency_type": consistency_type,
        "explanation": explanation,
        "bazi_contribution": bazi_result,
        "zodiac_contribution": zodiac_result
    }

def check_consistency(bazi_archetype, zodiac_archetype):
    """æ£€æŸ¥å…«å­—å’Œæ˜Ÿåº§åŸå‹çš„ä¸€è‡´æ€§"""

    if bazi_archetype == zodiac_archetype:
        return "perfect_match"  # å®Œç¾ä¸€è‡´

    # å®šä¹‰åŸå‹å¯¹ç«‹å…³ç³»
    OPPOSING_PAIRS = [
        ("Ruler", "Outlaw"),
        ("Hero", "Innocent"),
        ("Sage", "Jester"),
        ("Caregiver", "Explorer"),
    ]

    for pair in OPPOSING_PAIRS:
        if {bazi_archetype, zodiac_archetype} == set(pair):
            return "conflict"  # å¯¹ç«‹å†²çª

    # å®šä¹‰åŸå‹ç›¸è¿‘å…³ç³»
    SIMILAR_GROUPS = [
        {"Ruler", "Hero", "Magician"},
        {"Sage", "Caregiver", "Regular"},
        {"Creator", "Explorer", "Outlaw"},
        {"Lover", "Innocent", "Jester"},
    ]

    for group in SIMILAR_GROUPS:
        if bazi_archetype in group and zodiac_archetype in group:
            return "similar"  # ç›¸è¿‘

    return "neutral"  # ä¸­æ€§
```

```python
    else:
```

### 7.2 Context å®šä¹‰

```typescript
// context.tsx
interface BirthInfo {
  year: number
  month: number
  day: number
  hour?: number
  location?: string
}

interface VibeIDData {
  core: ArchetypeInfo
  inner: ArchetypeInfo
  outer: ArchetypeInfo
  shadow: ArchetypeInfo
  bazi: BaziData
  zodiac: ZodiacData
  explanation: ExplanationData
  confidence: number
}

type OnboardingStep = 'landing' | 'loading' | 'aha' | 'conversion'

interface OnboardingState {
  step: OnboardingStep
  birthInfo: BirthInfo | null
  vibeID: VibeIDData | null
  validationAnswer: 'yes' | 'no' | null
  selectedPlan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly'
  error: string | null
}

interface OnboardingContextValue {
  state: OnboardingState
  setBirthInfo: (info: BirthInfo) => void
  setVibeID: (data: VibeIDData) => void
  setValidationAnswer: (answer: 'yes' | 'no') => void
  setSelectedPlan: (plan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly') => void
  nextStep: () => void
  goToStep: (step: OnboardingStep) => void
  reset: () => void
}
```

```typescript
import LandingStep from './steps/LandingStep'
```

```typescript
// page.tsx - åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
import dynamic from 'next/dynamic'
import { Suspense } from 'react'

// LandingStep ä¸åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥ï¼ˆé¦–å±å¿…éœ€ï¼‰
import LandingStep from './steps/LandingStep'

// å…¶ä»–æ­¥éª¤åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
const LoadingStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/LoadingStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const AhaStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/AhaStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const ConversionStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/ConversionStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

export default function OnboardingPage() {
  const { state } = useOnboarding()

  if (state.step === 'landing') {
    return <LandingStep />
  }

  return (
    <Suspense fallback={<StepSkeleton />}>
      {state.step === 'loading' && <LoadingStep />}
      {state.step === 'aha' && <AhaStep />}
      {state.step === 'conversion' && <ConversionStep />}
    </Suspense>
  )
}
```

```typescript
// context.tsx
interface BirthInfo {
  year: number
  month: number
  day: number
  hour?: number
  location?: string
}

interface ArchetypeInfo {
  archetype: string
  archetype_chinese: string
  nickname: string
  tagline: string
  confidence?: number
  style?: string
}

interface VibeIDData {
  core: ArchetypeInfo
  inner: ArchetypeInfo
  outer: ArchetypeInfo
  shadow: ArchetypeInfo & { tension: string }
  bazi: {
    pattern: string
    useful_god: string
    day_master_strength: string
    four_pillars: any
  }
  zodiac: {
    sun_sign: string
    moon_sign: string
    rising_sign: string
    venus_sign: string
    mars_sign: string
  }
  explanation: {
    summary: string
    bazi_insight: string
    zodiac_insight: string
    integration_insight: string
    growth_direction: string
  }
  confidence: number
}

type OnboardingStep = 'landing' | 'loading' | 'aha' | 'conversion'

interface OnboardingState {
  step: OnboardingStep
  birthInfo: BirthInfo | null
  vibeID: VibeIDData | null
  validationAnswer: 'yes' | 'no' | null
  selectedPlan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly'
  error: string | null
  loading: boolean
}

interface OnboardingContextValue {
  state: OnboardingState
  setBirthInfo: (info: BirthInfo) => void
  setVibeID: (data: VibeIDData) => void
  setValidationAnswer: (answer: 'yes' | 'no') => void
  setSelectedPlan: (plan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly') => void
  nextStep: () => void
  goToStep: (step: OnboardingStep) => void
  reset: () => void
}
```

### 9.2 ä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹

```typescript
// page.tsx - åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
import dynamic from 'next/dynamic'
import { Suspense } from 'react'

// LandingStep ä¸åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥ï¼ˆé¦–å±å¿…éœ€ï¼‰
import LandingStep from './steps/LandingStep'

// å…¶ä»–æ­¥éª¤åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
const LoadingStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/LoadingStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const AhaStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/AhaStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const ConversionStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/ConversionStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

export default function OnboardingPage() {
  const { state } = useOnboarding()

  if (state.step === 'landing') {
    return <LandingStep />
  }

  return (
    <Suspense fallback={<StepSkeleton />}>
      {state.step === 'loading' && <LoadingStep />}
      {state.step === 'aha' && <AhaStep />}
      {state.step === 'conversion' && <ConversionStep />}
    </Suspense>
  )
}
```

1. **å…ˆéªŒæ€§ (A Priori)**

2. **æ™®éæ€§ (Universality)**
   - æ‰€æœ‰äººç±»æ–‡åŒ–ä¸­éƒ½èƒ½æ‰¾åˆ°ç›¸åŒçš„åŸå‹ä¸»é¢˜ï¼šè‹±é›„ä¹‹æ—…ã€æ™ºæ…§è€äººã€ä¼Ÿå¤§æ¯äº²...

   437â†’#### 2.1.4 æ—¥ä¸»å¼ºå¼±å¯¹åŸå‹è¡¨è¾¾çš„ä¿®æ­£
   438â†’
   439â†’```python
   440â†’def apply_strength_modifier(
   441â†’    archetype_scores: dict[Archetype, float],
   442â†’    strength: DayMasterStrength,
   443â†’    strength_score: float
   444â†’) -> dict[Archetype, float]:
   445â†’    """
   446â†’    æ—¥ä¸»å¼ºå¼±ä¿®æ­£åŸå‹è¡¨è¾¾
   447â†’
   448â†’    èº«æ—ºï¼šå¢å¼ºå¤–å‘å‹åŸå‹ï¼ˆHero, Ruler, Outlaw, Explorer, Creatorï¼‰
   449â†’    èº«å¼±ï¼šå¢å¼ºå†…å‘å‹åŸå‹ï¼ˆSage, Caregiver, Innocent, Lover, Regularï¼‰
   450â†’    """
   451â†’    EXTROVERT_ARCHETYPES = {
   452â†’        Archetype.HERO, Archetype.RULER, Archetype.OUTLAW,
   453â†’        Archetype.EXPLORER, Archetype.CREATOR, Archetype.JESTER
   454â†’    }
   455â†’    INTROVERT_ARCHETYPES = {
   456â†’        Archetype.SAGE, Archetype.CAREGIVER, Archetype.INNOCENT,
   457â†’        Archetype.LOVER, Archetype.REGULAR, Archetype.MAGICIAN
   458â†’    }
   459â†’
   460â†’    modified_scores = archetype_scores.copy()
   461â†’
   462â†’    if strength_score > 0:  # èº«æ—º
   463â†’        modifier = 1 + strength_score * 0.2  # æœ€å¤š+20%
   464â†’        for archetype in EXTROVERT_ARCHETYPES:
   465â†’            if archetype in modified_scores:
   466â†’                modified_scores[archetype] *= modifier
   467â†’    else:  # èº«å¼±
   468â†’        modifier = 1 + abs(strength_score) * 0.2
   469â†’        for archetype in INTROVERT_ARCHETYPES:
   470â†’            if archetype in modified_scores:
   471â†’                modified_scores[archetype] *= modifier
   472â†’
   473â†’    return modified_scores
   474â†’```

   502â†’

   586â†’
   587â†’```python
   588â†’def calculate_zodiac_archetype_scores(chart: ZodiacChart) -> dict[Archetype, float]:
   589â†’    """
   590â†’    åŸºäºäº”ç‚¹æ¨¡å‹è®¡ç®—æ˜Ÿåº§åŸå‹å¾—åˆ†
   591â†’    """
   592â†’    archetype_scores = {archetype: 0.0 for archetype in Archetype}
   593â†’    explanation_parts = []
   594â†’
   595â†’    # å¤ªé˜³æ˜Ÿåº§ï¼ˆ35%æƒé‡ï¼‰
   596â†’    sun_mapping = SUN_SIGN_ARCHETYPE_MAPPING[chart.sun_sign]
   597â†’    archetype_scores[sun_mapping["primary"]] += 0.35 * 1.0
   598â†’    archetype_scores[sun_mapping["secondary"]] += 0.35 * 0.5
   599â†’    explanation_parts.append(f"å¤ªé˜³{chart.sun_sign}èµ‹äºˆä½ {sun_mapping['primary'].value}çš„æ ¸å¿ƒç‰¹è´¨")
   600â†’
   601â†’    # æœˆäº®æ˜Ÿåº§ï¼ˆ25%æƒé‡ï¼‰
   602â†’    moon_mapping = MOON_SIGN_ARCHETYPE_MAPPING[chart.moon_sign]
   603â†’    archetype_scores[moon_mapping["primary"]] += 0.25 * 1.0
   604â†’    explanation_parts.append(f"æœˆäº®{chart.moon_sign}è®©ä½ çš„æƒ…æ„Ÿè¡¨è¾¾å‘ˆç°{moon_mapping['style']}")
   605â†’
   606â†’    # ä¸Šå‡æ˜Ÿåº§ï¼ˆ20%æƒé‡ï¼‰
   607â†’    asc_mapping = ASCENDANT_ARCHETYPE_MAPPING[chart.ascendant]
   608â†’    archetype_scores[asc_mapping["primary"]] += 0.20 * 1.0
   609â†’    explanation_parts.append(f"ä¸Šå‡{chart.ascendant}è®©ä½ ç»™äºº{asc_mapping['impression']}çš„å°è±¡")
   610â†’
   611â†’    # é‡‘æ˜Ÿæ˜Ÿåº§ï¼ˆ10%æƒé‡ï¼‰
   612â†’    venus_mapping = VENUS_SIGN_ARCHETYPE_MAPPING[chart.venus_sign]
   613â†’    archetype_scores[venus_mapping["primary"]] += 0.10 * 1.0
   614â†’    explanation_parts.append(f"é‡‘æ˜Ÿ{chart.venus_sign}è®©ä½ çš„çˆ±æƒ…é£æ ¼æ˜¯{venus_mapping['love_style']}")
   615â†’
   616â†’    # ç«æ˜Ÿæ˜Ÿåº§ï¼ˆ10%æƒé‡ï¼‰
   617â†’    mars_mapping = MARS_SIGN_ARCHETYPE_MAPPING[chart.mars_sign]
   618â†’    archetype_scores[mars_mapping["primary"]] += 0.10 * 1.0
   619â†’    explanation_parts.append(f"ç«æ˜Ÿ{chart.mars_sign}è®©ä½ çš„è¡ŒåŠ¨é£æ ¼æ˜¯{mars_mapping['action_style']}")
   620â†’
   621â†’    return archetype_scores, explanation_parts
   622â†’```

   624â†’### 2.3 ä¸œè¥¿æ–¹èåˆç®—æ³•
   625â†’
   626â†’#### 2.3.1 å…«å­—ä¸»å¯¼çš„èåˆè®¾è®¡
   627â†’
   628â†’```python
   629â†’class FusionStrategy:
   630â†’    """å…«å­—ä¸»å¯¼çš„ä¸œè¥¿æ–¹èåˆç­–ç•¥"""
   631â†’
   632â†’    # åŸºç¡€æƒé‡ï¼šå…«å­—70%ï¼Œæ˜Ÿåº§30%
   633â†’    BASE_BAZI_WEIGHT = 0.70
   634â†’    BASE_ZODIAC_WEIGHT = 0.30
   635â†’
   636â†’    # ä¸€è‡´æ€§å¥–åŠ±ï¼šå½“ä¸¤å¥—ç³»ç»ŸæŒ‡å‘åŒä¸€åŸå‹æ—¶
   637â†’    CONSISTENCY_BONUS = 0.15
   638â†’
   639â†’    # å†²çªå¤„ç†ï¼šå½“ä¸¤å¥—ç³»ç»ŸæŒ‡å‘å¯¹ç«‹åŸå‹æ—¶
   640â†’    CONFLICT_PENALTY = 0.10
   641â†’
   642â†’def calculate_fused_archetype(
   643â†’    bazi_scores: dict[Archetype, float],
   644â†’    zodiac_scores: dict[Archetype, float],
   645â†’    bazi_explanation: list[str],
   646â†’    zodiac_explanation: list[str]
   647â†’) -> VibeIDResult:
   648â†’    """
   649â†’    èåˆè®¡ç®—æœ€ç»ˆåŸå‹
   650â†’
   651â†’    ç­–ç•¥ï¼š
   652â†’    1. å…«å­—å†³å®šCoreåŸå‹ï¼ˆä¸»åŸå‹ï¼‰
   653â†’    2. æ˜Ÿåº§è°ƒæ•´è¡¨è¾¾å±‚æ¬¡ï¼ˆInner/Outerï¼‰
   654â†’    3. ä¸€è‡´æ€§å¢å¼ºç½®ä¿¡åº¦
   655â†’    4. å†²çªæ—¶å…«å­—ä¼˜å…ˆ
   656â†’    """
   657â†’
   658â†’    # Step 1: è·å–å…«å­—ä¸»åŸå‹
   659â†’    bazi_primary = max(bazi_scores, key=bazi_scores.get)
   660â†’    bazi_primary_score = bazi_scores[bazi_primary]
   661â†’
   662â†’    # Step 2: è·å–æ˜Ÿåº§ä¸»åŸå‹
   663â†’    zodiac_primary = max(zodiac_scores, key=zodiac_scores.get)
   664â†’    zodiac_primary_score = zodiac_scores[zodiac_primary]
   665â†’
   666â†’    # Step 3: ä¸€è‡´æ€§æ£€æŸ¥
   667â†’    consistency_type = check_consistency(bazi_primary, zodiac_primary)
   668â†’
   669â†’    # Step 4: èåˆè®¡ç®—
   670â†’    fused_scores = {}
   671â†’    for archetype in Archetype:
   672â†’        base_score = (
   673â†’            bazi_scores.get(archetype, 0) * FusionStrategy.BASE_BAZI_WEIGHT +
   674â†’            zodiac_scores.get(archetype, 0) * FusionStrategy.BASE_ZODIAC_WEIGHT
   675â†’        )
   676â†’
   677â†’        # ä¸€è‡´æ€§å¥–åŠ±
   678â†’        if archetype == bazi_primary and archetype == zodiac_primary:
   679â†’            base_score += FusionStrategy.CONSISTENCY_BONUS
   680â†’
   681â†’        fused_scores[archetype] = base_score
   682â†’
   683â†’    # Step 5: ç¡®å®šæœ€ç»ˆåŸå‹
   684â†’    primary_archetype = max(fused_scores, key=fused_scores.get)
   685â†’
   686â†’    # Step 6: ç¡®å®šå‰¯åŸå‹ï¼ˆæ’é™¤ä¸»åŸå‹åçš„æœ€é«˜åˆ†ï¼‰
   687â†’    secondary_scores = {k: v for k, v in fused_scores.items() if k != primary_archetype}
   688â†’    secondary_archetype = max(secondary_scores, key=secondary_scores.get)
   689â†’
   690â†’    # Step 7: ç”Ÿæˆè§£é‡Š
   691â†’    explanation = generate_explanation(
   692â†’        primary_archetype, secondary_archetype,
   693â†’        bazi_primary, zodiac_primary,
   694â†’        consistency_type,
   695â†’        bazi_explanation, zodiac_explanation
   696â†’    )
   697â†’
   698â†’    # Step 8: è®¡ç®—ç½®ä¿¡åº¦
   699â†’    confidence = calculate_confidence(
   700â†’        fused_scores[primary_archetype],
   701â†’        fused_scores[secondary_archetype],
   702â†’        consistency_type
   703â†’    )
   704â†’
   705â†’    return VibeIDResult(
   706â†’        primary_archetype=primary_archetype,
   707â†’        secondary_archetype=secondary_archetype,
   708â†’        all_scores=fused_scores,
   709â†’        confidence=confidence,
   710â†’        explanation=explanation,
   711â†’        bazi_contribution=bazi_explanation,
   712â†’        zodiac_contribution=zodiac_explanation
   713â†’    )
   714â†’
   715â†’def check_consistency(bazi_archetype: Archetype, zodiac_archetype: Archetype) -> str:
   716â†’    """
   717â†’    æ£€æŸ¥å…«å­—å’Œæ˜Ÿåº§åŸå‹çš„ä¸€è‡´æ€§
   718â†’    """
   719â†’    if bazi_archetype == zodiac_archetype:
   720â†’        return "perfect_match"  # å®Œç¾ä¸€è‡´
   721â†’
   722â†’    # å®šä¹‰åŸå‹å¯¹ç«‹å…³ç³»
   723â†’    OPPOSING_PAIRS = [
   724â†’        (Archetype.RULER, Archetype.OUTLAW),
   725â†’        (Archetype.HERO, Archetype.INNOCENT),
   726â†’        (Archetype.SAGE, Archetype.JESTER),
   727â†’        (Archetype.CAREGIVER, Archetype.EXPLORER),
   728â†’    ]
   729â†’
   730â†’    for pair in OPPOSING_PAIRS:
   731â†’        if {bazi_archetype, zodiac_archetype} == set(pair):
   732â†’            return "conflict"  # å¯¹ç«‹å†²çª
   733â†’
   734â†’    # å®šä¹‰åŸå‹ç›¸è¿‘å…³ç³»
   735â†’    SIMILAR_GROUPS = [
   736â†’        {Archetype.RULER, Archetype.HERO, Archetype.MAGICIAN},
   737â†’        {Archetype.SAGE, Archetype.CAREGIVER, Archetype.REGULAR},
   738â†’        {Archetype.CREATOR, Archetype.EXPLORER, Archetype.OUTLAW},
   739â†’        {Archetype.LOVER, Archetype.INNOCENT, Archetype.JESTER},
   740â†’    ]
   741â†’
   742â†’    for group in SIMILAR_GROUPS:
   743â†’        if bazi_archetype in group and zodiac_archetype in group:
   744â†’            return "similar"  # ç›¸è¿‘
   745â†’
   746â†’    return "neutral"  # ä¸­æ€§
   747â†’```
   748â†’
   749â†’#### 2.3.2 å¯è§£é‡Šæ€§æ¨¡å—
   750â†’
   751â†’```python
   752â†’def generate_explanation(
   753â†’    primary: Archetype,
   754â†’    secondary: Archetype,
   755â†’    bazi_primary: Archetype,
   756â†’    zodiac_primary: Archetype,
   757â†’    consistency: str,
   758â†’    bazi_explanation: list[str],
   759â†’    zodiac_explanation: list[str]
   760â†’) -> dict:
   761â†’    """
   762â†’    ç”Ÿæˆç”¨æˆ·å¯ç†è§£çš„åŸå‹è§£é‡Š
   763â†’    """
   764â†’
   765â†’    explanation = {
   766â†’        "summary": "",
   767â†’        "bazi_insight": "",

```typescript
  archetype: string
  archetype_chinese: string
  nickname: string
  tagline: string

  style?: string
}

interface VibeIDData {

  explanation: {

    bazi_insight: string
    zodiac_insight: string
    integration_insight: string
    growth_direction: string
  }
  confidence: number
}

type OnboardingStep = 'landing' | 'loading' | 'aha' | 'conversion'

interface OnboardingState {
  step: OnboardingStep
  birthInfo: BirthInfo | null
  vibeID: VibeIDData | null
  validationAnswer: 'yes' | 'no' | null
  selectedPlan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly'
  error: string | null
  loading: boolean
}

interface OnboardingContextValue {
  state: OnboardingState
  setBirthInfo: (info: BirthInfo) => void
  setVibeID: (data: VibeIDData) => void
  setValidationAnswer: (answer: 'yes' | 'no') => void
  setSelectedPlan: (plan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly') => void
  nextStep: () => void
  goToStep: (step: OnboardingStep) => void
  reset: () => void
}
```

```typescript
// page.tsx - åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
import dynamic from 'next/dynamic'
import { Suspense } from 'react'

// LandingStep ä¸åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥ï¼ˆé¦–å±å¿…éœ€ï¼‰
import LandingStep from './steps/LandingStep'

// å…¶ä»–æ­¥éª¤åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
const LoadingStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/LoadingStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const AhaStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/AhaStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const ConversionStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/ConversionStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

export default function OnboardingPage() {
  const { state } = useOnboarding()

  if (state.step === 'landing') {
    return <LandingStep />
  }

  return (
    <Suspense fallback={<StepSkeleton />}>
      {state.step === 'loading' && <LoadingStep />}
      {state.step === 'aha' && <AhaStep />}
      {state.step === 'conversion' && <ConversionStep />}
    </Suspense>
  )
}
```

```typescript
// context.tsx
interface BirthInfo {
  year: number
  month: number
  day: number
  hour?: number
  location?: string
}

interface ArchetypeInfo {
  archetype: string
  archetype_chinese: string
  nickname: string
  tagline: string
  confidence?: number
  style?: string
}

interface VibeIDData {
  core: ArchetypeInfo
  inner: ArchetypeInfo
  outer: ArchetypeInfo
  shadow: ArchetypeInfo & { tension: string }
  bazi: {
    pattern: string
    useful_god: string
    day_master_strength: string
    four_pillars: any
  }
  zodiac: {
    sun_sign: string
    moon_sign: string
    rising_sign: string
    venus_sign: string
    mars_sign: string
  }
  explanation: {
    summary: string
    bazi_insight: string
    zodiac_insight: string
    integration_insight: string
    growth_direction: string
  }
  confidence: number
}

type OnboardingStep = 'landing' | 'loading' | 'aha' | 'conversion'

interface OnboardingState {
  step: OnboardingStep
  birthInfo: BirthInfo | null
  vibeID: VibeIDData | null
  validationAnswer: 'yes' | 'no' | null
  selectedPlan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly'
  error: string | null
  loading: boolean
}

interface OnboardingContextValue {
  state: OnboardingState
  setBirthInfo: (info: BirthInfo) => void
  setVibeID: (data: VibeIDData) => void
  setValidationAnswer: (answer: 'yes' | 'no') => void
  setSelectedPlan: (plan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly') => void
  nextStep: () => void
  goToStep: (step: OnboardingStep) => void
  reset: () => void
}
```

```typescript
import { Suspense } from 'react'

// LandingStep ä¸åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥ï¼ˆé¦–å±å¿…éœ€ï¼‰
import LandingStep from './steps/LandingStep'

// å…¶ä»–æ­¥éª¤åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
const LoadingStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/LoadingStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const AhaStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/AhaStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const ConversionStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/ConversionStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

export default function OnboardingPage() {
  const { state } = useOnboarding()

  if (state.step === 'landing') {
    return <LandingStep />
  }

  return (
    <Suspense fallback={<StepSkeleton />}>
      {state.step === 'loading' && <LoadingStep />}
      {state.step === 'aha' && <AhaStep />}
      {state.step === 'conversion' && <ConversionStep />}
    </Suspense>
  )
}
```

```typescript
// context.tsx
interface BirthInfo {

  month: number
  day: number

  location?: string
}

interface ArchetypeInfo {
  archetype: string
  archetype_chinese: string
  nickname: string
  tagline: string
  confidence?: number
  style?: string
}

interface VibeIDData {
  core: ArchetypeInfo
  inner: ArchetypeInfo
  outer: ArchetypeInfo
  shadow: ArchetypeInfo & { tension: string }
  bazi: {
    pattern: string
    useful_god: string

  }
  zodiac: {
    sun_sign: string
    moon_sign: string
    rising_sign: string
    venus_sign: string
    mars_sign: string
  }
  explanation: {
    summary: string
    bazi_insight: string
    zodiac_insight: string
    integration_insight: string
    growth_direction: string
  }
  confidence: number
}

type OnboardingStep = 'landing' | 'loading' | 'aha' | 'conversion'

interface OnboardingState {
  step: OnboardingStep
  birthInfo: BirthInfo | null
  vibeID: VibeIDData | null
  validationAnswer: 'yes' | 'no' | null
  selectedPlan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly'
  error: string | null
  loading: boolean
}

interface OnboardingContextValue {
  state: OnboardingState
  setBirthInfo: (info: BirthInfo) => void
  setVibeID: (data: VibeIDData) => void
  setValidationAnswer: (answer: 'yes' | 'no') => void
  setSelectedPlan: (plan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly') => void
  nextStep: () => void
  goToStep: (step: OnboardingStep) => void
  reset: () => void
}
```

### 9.1 Vercel Best Practices æ¸…å•

### 9.2 ä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹

```typescript
// page.tsx - åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
import dynamic from 'next/dynamic'
import { Suspense } from 'react'

// LandingStep ä¸åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥ï¼ˆé¦–å±å¿…éœ€ï¼‰
import LandingStep from './steps/LandingStep'

// å…¶ä»–æ­¥éª¤åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
const LoadingStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/LoadingStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const AhaStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/AhaStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const ConversionStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/ConversionStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

export default function OnboardingPage() {
  const { state } = useOnboarding()

  if (state.step === 'landing') {
    return <LandingStep />
  }

  return (
    <Suspense fallback={<StepSkeleton />}>
      {state.step === 'loading' && <LoadingStep />}
      {state.step === 'aha' && <AhaStep />}
      {state.step === 'conversion' && <ConversionStep />}
    </Suspense>
  )
}
```

```typescript
// page.tsx - åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
import dynamic from 'next/dynamic'
import { Suspense } from 'react'

// LandingStep ä¸åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥ï¼ˆé¦–å±å¿…éœ€ï¼‰
import LandingStep from './steps/LandingStep'

// å…¶ä»–æ­¥éª¤åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
const LoadingStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/LoadingStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const AhaStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/AhaStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const ConversionStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/ConversionStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

export default function OnboardingPage() {
  const { state } = useOnboarding()

  if (state.step === 'landing') {
    return <LandingStep />
  }

  return (
    <Suspense fallback={<StepSkeleton />}>
      {state.step === 'loading' && <LoadingStep />}
      {state.step === 'aha' && <AhaStep />}
      {state.step === 'conversion' && <ConversionStep />}
    </Suspense>
  )
}
```

```typescript
// context.tsx
interface BirthInfo {
  year: number
  month: number
  day: number
  hour?: number
  location?: string
}

interface ArchetypeInfo {
  archetype: string
  archetype_chinese: string
  nickname: string
  tagline: string
  confidence?: number
  style?: string
}

interface VibeIDData {
  core: ArchetypeInfo
  inner: ArchetypeInfo
  outer: ArchetypeInfo
  shadow: ArchetypeInfo & { tension: string }
  bazi: {
    pattern: string
    useful_god: string
    day_master_strength: string
    four_pillars: any
  }
  zodiac: {
    sun_sign: string
    moon_sign: string
    rising_sign: string
    venus_sign: string
    mars_sign: string
  }
  explanation: {
    summary: string
    bazi_insight: string
    zodiac_insight: string
    integration_insight: string
    growth_direction: string
  }
  confidence: number
}

type OnboardingStep = 'landing' | 'loading' | 'aha' | 'conversion'

interface OnboardingState {
  step: OnboardingStep
  birthInfo: BirthInfo | null
  vibeID: VibeIDData | null
  validationAnswer: 'yes' | 'no' | null
  selectedPlan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly'
  error: string | null
  loading: boolean
}

interface OnboardingContextValue {
  state: OnboardingState
  setBirthInfo: (info: BirthInfo) => void
  setVibeID: (data: VibeIDData) => void
  setValidationAnswer: (answer: 'yes' | 'no') => void
  setSelectedPlan: (plan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly') => void
  nextStep: () => void
  goToStep: (step: OnboardingStep) => void
  reset: () => void
}
```

### 9.1 Vercel Best Practices æ¸…å•

### 9.2 ä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹

```typescript
// page.tsx - åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
import dynamic from 'next/dynamic'
import { Suspense } from 'react'

// LandingStep ä¸åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥ï¼ˆé¦–å±å¿…éœ€ï¼‰
import LandingStep from './steps/LandingStep'

// å…¶ä»–æ­¥éª¤åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
const LoadingStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/LoadingStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const AhaStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/AhaStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const ConversionStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/ConversionStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

export default function OnboardingPage() {
  const { state } = useOnboarding()

  if (state.step === 'landing') {
    return <LandingStep />
  }

  return (
    <Suspense fallback={<StepSkeleton />}>
      {state.step === 'loading' && <LoadingStep />}
      {state.step === 'aha' && <AhaStep />}
      {state.step === 'conversion' && <ConversionStep />}
    </Suspense>
  )
}
```

```typescript
// context.tsx
interface BirthInfo {
  year: number
  month: number
  day: number
  hour?: number
  location?: string
}

interface ArchetypeInfo {
  archetype: string
  archetype_chinese: string
  nickname: string
  tagline: string
  confidence?: number
  style?: string
}

interface VibeIDData {
  core: ArchetypeInfo
  inner: ArchetypeInfo
  outer: ArchetypeInfo
  shadow: ArchetypeInfo & { tension: string }
  bazi: {
    pattern: string
    useful_god: string
    day_master_strength: string
    four_pillars: any
  }
  zodiac: {
    sun_sign: string
    moon_sign: string
    rising_sign: string
    venus_sign: string
    mars_sign: string
  }
  explanation: {
    summary: string
    bazi_insight: string
    zodiac_insight: string
    integration_insight: string
    growth_direction: string
  }
  confidence: number
}

type OnboardingStep = 'landing' | 'loading' | 'aha' | 'conversion'

interface OnboardingState {
  step: OnboardingStep
  birthInfo: BirthInfo | null
  vibeID: VibeIDData | null
  validationAnswer: 'yes' | 'no' | null
  selectedPlan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly'
  error: string | null
  loading: boolean
}

interface OnboardingContextValue {
  state: OnboardingState
  setBirthInfo: (info: BirthInfo) => void
  setVibeID: (data: VibeIDData) => void
  setValidationAnswer: (answer: 'yes' | 'no') => void
  setSelectedPlan: (plan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly') => void
  nextStep: () => void
  goToStep: (step: OnboardingStep) => void
  reset: () => void
}
```

### 9.2 ä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹

```typescript
// page.tsx - åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
import dynamic from 'next/dynamic'
import { Suspense } from 'react'

// LandingStep ä¸åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥ï¼ˆé¦–å±å¿…éœ€ï¼‰
import LandingStep from './steps/LandingStep'

// å…¶ä»–æ­¥éª¤åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
const LoadingStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/LoadingStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const AhaStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/AhaStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const ConversionStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/ConversionStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

export default function OnboardingPage() {
  const { state } = useOnboarding()

  if (state.step === 'landing') {
    return <LandingStep />
  }

  return (
    <Suspense fallback={<StepSkeleton />}>
      {state.step === 'loading' && <LoadingStep />}
      {state.step === 'aha' && <AhaStep />}
      {state.step === 'conversion' && <ConversionStep />}
    </Suspense>
  )
}
```

```typescript
  archetype_chinese: string

}

  explanation: {

    integration_insight: string
    growth_direction: string
  }
  confidence: number
}

type OnboardingStep = 'landing' | 'loading' | 'aha' | 'conversion'

interface OnboardingState {
  step: OnboardingStep

  vibeID: VibeIDData | null
  validationAnswer: 'yes' | 'no' | null
  selectedPlan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly'
  error: string | null
  loading: boolean
}

interface OnboardingContextValue {

  setBirthInfo: (info: BirthInfo) => void
  setVibeID: (data: VibeIDData) => void
  setValidationAnswer: (answer: 'yes' | 'no') => void
  setSelectedPlan: (plan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly') => void
  nextStep: () => void
  goToStep: (step: OnboardingStep) => void
  reset: () => void
}
```

### 9.2 ä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹

```typescript
// page.tsx - åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
import dynamic from 'next/dynamic'
import { Suspense } from 'react'

// LandingStep ä¸åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥ï¼ˆé¦–å±å¿…éœ€ï¼‰
import LandingStep from './steps/LandingStep'

// å…¶ä»–æ­¥éª¤åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
const LoadingStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/LoadingStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const AhaStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/AhaStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const ConversionStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/ConversionStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

export default function OnboardingPage() {
  const { state } = useOnboarding()

  if (state.step === 'landing') {
    return <LandingStep />
  }

  return (
    <Suspense fallback={<StepSkeleton />}>
      {state.step === 'loading' && <LoadingStep />}
      {state.step === 'aha' && <AhaStep />}
      {state.step === 'conversion' && <ConversionStep />}
    </Suspense>
  )
}
```

### 7.2 Context å®šä¹‰

```typescript
// context.tsx
interface BirthInfo {
  year: number
  month: number
  day: number
  hour?: number
  location?: string
}

interface ArchetypeInfo {
  archetype: string
  archetype_chinese: string
  nickname: string
  tagline: string
  confidence?: number
  style?: string
}

interface VibeIDData {
  core: ArchetypeInfo
  inner: ArchetypeInfo
  outer: ArchetypeInfo
  shadow: ArchetypeInfo & { tension: string }
  bazi: {
    pattern: string
    useful_god: string
    day_master_strength: string
    four_pillars: any
  }
  zodiac: {
    sun_sign: string
    moon_sign: string
    rising_sign: string
    venus_sign: string
    mars_sign: string
  }
  explanation: {
    summary: string
    bazi_insight: string
    zodiac_insight: string
    integration_insight: string
    growth_direction: string
  }
  confidence: number
}

type OnboardingStep = 'landing' | 'loading' | 'aha' | 'conversion'

interface OnboardingState {
  step: OnboardingStep
  birthInfo: BirthInfo | null
  vibeID: VibeIDData | null
  validationAnswer: 'yes' | 'no' | null
  selectedPlan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly'
  error: string | null
  loading: boolean
}

interface OnboardingContextValue {
  state: OnboardingState
  setBirthInfo: (info: BirthInfo) => void
  setVibeID: (data: VibeIDData) => void
  setValidationAnswer: (answer: 'yes' | 'no') => void
  setSelectedPlan: (plan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly') => void
  nextStep: () => void
  goToStep: (step: OnboardingStep) => void
  reset: () => void
}
```

### 9.2 ä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹

```typescript
// page.tsx - åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
import dynamic from 'next/dynamic'
import { Suspense } from 'react'

// LandingStep ä¸åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥ï¼ˆé¦–å±å¿…éœ€ï¼‰
import LandingStep from './steps/LandingStep'

// å…¶ä»–æ­¥éª¤åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
const LoadingStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/LoadingStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const AhaStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/AhaStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const ConversionStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/ConversionStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

export default function OnboardingPage() {
  const { state } = useOnboarding()

  if (state.step === 'landing') {
    return <LandingStep />
  }

  return (
    <Suspense fallback={<StepSkeleton />}>
      {state.step === 'loading' && <LoadingStep />}
      {state.step === 'aha' && <AhaStep />}
      {state.step === 'conversion' && <ConversionStep />}
    </Suspense>
  )
}
```

### 7.2 Context å®šä¹‰

```typescript
// context.tsx
interface BirthInfo {
  year: number
  month: number
  day: number
  hour?: number
  location?: string
}

interface ArchetypeInfo {
  archetype: string
  archetype_chinese: string
  nickname: string
  tagline: string
  confidence?: number
  style?: string
}

interface VibeIDData {
  core: ArchetypeInfo
  inner: ArchetypeInfo
  outer: ArchetypeInfo
  shadow: ArchetypeInfo & { tension: string }
  bazi: {
    pattern: string
    useful_god: string
    day_master_strength: string
    four_pillars: any
  }
  zodiac: {
    sun_sign: string
    moon_sign: string
    rising_sign: string
    venus_sign: string
    mars_sign: string
  }
  explanation: {
    summary: string
    bazi_insight: string
    zodiac_insight: string
    integration_insight: string
    growth_direction: string
  }
  confidence: number
}

type OnboardingStep = 'landing' | 'loading' | 'aha' | 'conversion'

interface OnboardingState {
  step: OnboardingStep
  birthInfo: BirthInfo | null
  vibeID: VibeIDData | null
  validationAnswer: 'yes' | 'no' | null
  selectedPlan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly'
  error: string | null
  loading: boolean
}

interface OnboardingContextValue {
  state: OnboardingState
  setBirthInfo: (info: BirthInfo) => void
  setVibeID: (data: VibeIDData) => void
  setValidationAnswer: (answer: 'yes' | 'no') => void
  setSelectedPlan: (plan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly') => void
  nextStep: () => void
  goToStep: (step: OnboardingStep) => void
  reset: () => void
}
```

```typescript
import LandingStep from './steps/LandingStep'

  }
```

```typescript
  setSelectedPlan: (plan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly') => void
  nextStep: () => void
  goToStep: (step: OnboardingStep) => void
  reset: () => void
}
```

### 9.1 Vercel Best Practices æ¸…å•

| ä¼˜åŒ–é¡¹ | å®æ–½æ–¹å¼ |

### 9.2 ä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹

```typescript
// page.tsx - åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
import dynamic from 'next/dynamic'
import { Suspense } from 'react'

// LandingStep ä¸åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥ï¼ˆé¦–å±å¿…éœ€ï¼‰
import LandingStep from './steps/LandingStep'

// å…¶ä»–æ­¥éª¤åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
const LoadingStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/LoadingStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const AhaStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/AhaStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const ConversionStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/ConversionStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

export default function OnboardingPage() {
  const { state } = useOnboarding()

  if (state.step === 'landing') {
    return <LandingStep />
  }

  return (
    <Suspense fallback={<StepSkeleton />}>
      {state.step === 'loading' && <LoadingStep />}
      {state.step === 'aha' && <AhaStep />}
      {state.step === 'conversion' && <ConversionStep />}
    </Suspense>
  )
}
```

```typescript
// context.tsx
interface BirthInfo {

  month: number
  day: number
  hour?: number
  location?: string
}

interface ArchetypeInfo {
  archetype: string
  archetype_chinese: string
  nickname: string
  tagline: string
  confidence?: number
  style?: string
}

interface VibeIDData {
  core: ArchetypeInfo
  inner: ArchetypeInfo
  outer: ArchetypeInfo
  shadow: ArchetypeInfo & { tension: string }
  bazi: {
    pattern: string
    useful_god: string
    day_master_strength: string
    four_pillars: any
  }
  zodiac: {
    sun_sign: string
    moon_sign: string
    rising_sign: string
    venus_sign: string
    mars_sign: string
  }
  explanation: {
    summary: string
    bazi_insight: string
    zodiac_insight: string
    integration_insight: string
    growth_direction: string
  }
  confidence: number
}

type OnboardingStep = 'landing' | 'loading' | 'aha' | 'conversion'

interface OnboardingState {
  step: OnboardingStep
  birthInfo: BirthInfo | null
  vibeID: VibeIDData | null
  validationAnswer: 'yes' | 'no' | null
  selectedPlan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly'
  error: string | null
  loading: boolean
}

interface OnboardingContextValue {
  state: OnboardingState
  setBirthInfo: (info: BirthInfo) => void
  setVibeID: (data: VibeIDData) => void
  setValidationAnswer: (answer: 'yes' | 'no') => void
  setSelectedPlan: (plan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly') => void
  nextStep: () => void
  goToStep: (step: OnboardingStep) => void
  reset: () => void
}
```

### 9.1 Vercel Best Practices æ¸…å•

| ä¼˜åŒ–é¡¹ | å®æ–½æ–¹å¼ |

| client-swr-dedup | VibeID è®¡ç®—ç»“æœç¼“å­˜ |

### 9.2 ä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹

```typescript
// page.tsx - åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
import dynamic from 'next/dynamic'
import { Suspense } from 'react'

// LandingStep ä¸åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥ï¼ˆé¦–å±å¿…éœ€ï¼‰
import LandingStep from './steps/LandingStep'

// å…¶ä»–æ­¥éª¤åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥
const LoadingStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/LoadingStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const AhaStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/AhaStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const ConversionStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/ConversionStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

export default function OnboardingPage() {
  const { state } = useOnboarding()

  if (state.step === 'landing') {
    return <LandingStep />
  }

  return (
    <Suspense fallback={<StepSkeleton />}>
      {state.step === 'loading' && <LoadingStep />}
      {state.step === 'aha' && <AhaStep />}
      {state.step === 'conversion' && <ConversionStep />}
    </Suspense>
  )
}
```

```typescript
// context.tsx
interface BirthInfo {
  year: number
  month: number
  day: number
  hour?: number
  location?: string
}

interface ArchetypeInfo {
  archetype: string
  archetype_chinese: string
  nickname: string
  tagline: string
  confidence?: number
  style?: string
}

interface VibeIDData {
  core: ArchetypeInfo
  inner: ArchetypeInfo
  outer: ArchetypeInfo
  shadow: ArchetypeInfo & { tension: string }
  bazi: {
    pattern: string
    useful_god: string
    day_master_strength: string
    four_pillars: any
  }
  zodiac: {
    sun_sign: string
    moon_sign: string
    rising_sign: string
    venus_sign: string
    mars_sign: string
  }
  explanation: {
    summary: string
    bazi_insight: string
    zodiac_insight: string
    integration_insight: string
    growth_direction: string
  }
  confidence: number
}

type OnboardingStep = 'landing' | 'loading' | 'aha' | 'conversion'

interface OnboardingState {
  step: OnboardingStep
  birthInfo: BirthInfo | null
  vibeID: VibeIDData | null
  validationAnswer: 'yes' | 'no' | null
  selectedPlan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly'
  error: string | null
  loading: boolean
}

interface OnboardingContextValue {
  state: OnboardingState
  setBirthInfo: (info: BirthInfo) => void
  setVibeID: (data: VibeIDData) => void
  setValidationAnswer: (answer: 'yes' | 'no') => void
  setSelectedPlan: (plan: 'monthly' | 'quarterly' | 'yearly') => void
  nextStep: () => void
  goToStep: (step: OnboardingStep) => void
  reset: () => void
}
```

```typescript
  ssr: false

const AhaStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/AhaStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

const ConversionStep = dynamic(() => import('./steps/ConversionStep'), {
  loading: () => <StepSkeleton />,
  ssr: false
})

export default function OnboardingPage() {
  const { state } = useOnboarding()

  if (state.step === 'landing') {
    return <LandingStep />
  }

  return (
    <Suspense fallback={<StepSkeleton />}>
      {state.step === 'loading' && <LoadingStep />}
      {state.step === 'aha' && <AhaStep />}
      {state.step === 'conversion' && <ConversionStep />}
    </Suspense>
  )
}
```
